description:
Contains the following content:

‚óè Rider's Layered Armor: Hakum Rider Outfit

This content is cosmetic and does not confer any status benefits.

Note: This content can also be obtained by using any of the six amiibo released for the previous title in the series, "Monster Hunter Stories". After purchasing, restart the game to receive add-on content. Outfits can be changed using the chest in Your House after progressing the game to a certain point.
name: Rider's Layered Armor: Hakum Rider Outfit
